body: @wangsiyu The `MirroredStrategy` is using synchronous training no matter whether it is multi-GPU or multi-worker (which will be ready soon). We've changed the `optimizer` code so that gradients reduction happens silently: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/optimizer.py#L557
